com.example.triangle

Class MainActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.example.triangle.MainActivity

  • public class MainActivity
extends Activity
    Class for creating a user interface for Triangle App , to be run on an AVD emulator or any Android device

    kannanb

        Parameters:

        length - of second side
        length - of third side
        Returns:
